media:group.media:title: rwm 1.0 released!
media:group.media:description:
Today I'm celebrating the release of rwm 1.0! Last night I worked out the last few bugs in my port of dwm 6.5 to Rust and tagged the 1.0 release. In this video I show off a few of the features inherited from dwm and discuss my future plans for the project. If you're interested in rwm, go give it a try and be sure to report any bugs you run into!
Repo: https://github.com/ntBre/rwm
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0PBefyEK7qQ7HN325nUamQ/join

media:group.media:title: Status of rwm
media:group.media:description:
rwm is my port of the dwm window manager to Rust and the subject of my previous two streams. This is a quick update on the (slow) progress of the project and the near-term goals in lieu of another stream this weekend.
rwm part 2: https://youtube.com/live/BZRJbxwhvp4 rwm part 1: https://youtube.com/live/FdZ2cgXSyYc
dwm: https://dwm.suckless.org/ rwm: https://github.com/ntBre/rwm/tree/bindgen

entry.title: Emacs for Rust Development | January 2024 Edition

media:group.media:title: Emacs for Rust Development | January 2024 Edition
media:group.media:description:
This is an excerpt from my recent rwm live stream in which I was rewriting my window manager in Rust. To test the window manager, I spun up a fresh virtual machine and started a new Emacs configuration. In these clips, I cobble together a decent Rust development environment with the built-in rust-ts-mode and eglot (language server client) and Elpa packages like company (auto-completion) and magit (git porcelain).
The config: https://github.com/ntBre/.emacs
Join this channel to get access to perks: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0PBefyEK7qQ7HN325nUamQ/join
0:00 Intro 0:10 Set custom-file 1:03 Set backup and auto-save locations 1:59 Install evil-mode 2:37 ido-mode 3:05 Setting a larger font 3:34 Turning off bars 4:07 rust-ts-mode 4:21 treesit-install-language-grammar 4:42 eglot 5:26 magit 5:58 Loading a theme 6:16 rust-ts-mode config 7:01 company-mode 7:47 Binding recompile 8:08 evil-set-undo-system 8:43 Binding eglot-format 9:13 eglot Rust config 10:33 Binding code actions
